name: 曾彥翔
objective:
本課程教授可程式控制器與人機介面之基本概念、硬體架構、操作原理、與程式語言。由實習中了解可程式控制器與人機介面在自動化控制系統中之應用。 
This course aims to teach the fundamental concepts, hardware structure, principles of operation, and programming language of programmable logic controller (PLC) and Human Machine Interface(HMI). To familiarize students with PLC/HMI applications on automatic control systems through hands-on practices.
